channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Attacks Liz Cheney Using Violent War Imagery
item.description: In an onstage interview in Arizona with Tucker Carlson, former President Donald J. Trump slammed a top Republican critic as he criticized U.S. involve...

item.title: How Wagner’s Ruthless Image Crumbled in Mali
item.description: The Russian mercenary group operated with little pushback in the West African nation — until it launched one of its most ambitious missions.

item.title: Why There’s Hope for U.S. Factory Towns Laid Low by the ‘China Shock’
item.description: Communities that suffered the worst of plant closings in recent decades are now gaining an outsize share of fresh investment and new jobs.

item.title: CEOs on Trump v. Harris
item.description: U.S. leaders are more concerned about domestic regulation while their foreign counterparts are worried about tariffs.

item.title: How Wagner’s Ruthless Image Crumbled in Mali
item.description: The Russian mercenary group operated with little pushback in the West African nation — until it launched one of its most ambitious missions.

item.title: Destructive Israeli Raid in West Bank Kills 5, Palestinians Say
item.description: The Israeli military said its soldiers had engaged in close combat in the Nur Shams area of the occupied territory.

item.title: I Gave Up Orthodox Judaism. I Kept Prayer.
item.description: It’s what can we do when we don’t know what to do.

item.title: 3 ancient foods are the staple of this blue zone’s longevity diet
item.description: Bring in the “three sisters” of Nicoya, Costa Rica to your longevity recipe.

item.title: Xenophobia and Hate Speech Are Spiking Heading into the Election
item.description: Leading Republican politicians and lax social media controls have contributed to a proliferation of hate rhetoric and anti-immigrant sentiment.

item.title: Kamala Harris Can Make History, Whether or Not She Wants to Talk About It
item.description: Don’t let the monarch of Mar-a-Lago take back his throne.

item.title: As Famine Stalks Gaza, Farmers Lament Their Many Losses
item.description: After more than a year of war, farmers have lost land, equipment and sometimes their lives.

item.title: How your business can make the most of abundant computing power in the age of AI
item.description: In what novel ways might leaders create, deliver, and capture value?

item.title: Huawei is ‘still struggling,’ says founder Ren Zhengfei, as the tech company rebounds from years of sanctions
item.description: “Even now, we can’t say we’ve secured survival."

item.title: Repression Intensifies in the Country Hosting a Major Climate Meeting
item.description: Human rights watchdogs say Azerbaijan is in the midst of a vicious campaign of repression. But in global geopolitics, this energy-rich Caucasus countr...

item.title: Chinese shopping platform Temu hit by EU investigation over illegal products and a ‘potentially addictive design’
item.description: Temu has on average around 92 million monthly active users in the European bloc. The investigation could lead to large fines.
